about_the_game:
This collection of assets is a collection of music loops from the official DLC "Magical Sound Adventure -Light / Dark" for the Pixel Game Maker MV.
As this software was primarily designed for action games, most of the tracks are up-tempo and suited for specific situations. Nevertheless, we encourage you to explore their versatility and consider using them in a range of contexts!
The "Light" tracks are characterized by their uplifting and radiant atmosphere, while the "Dark" tracks evoke a sense of mystery and intrigue, drawing inspiration from the enchanting realms of fantasy.
We hope that these tracks will serve as a valuable addition to your creative endeavors, enriching and elevating your projects to new heights!

Included Tracks
1 A Tale of a Distant Country (Town)
2 Dancing with the Wind（field）
3 Through the Trees（field）
4 Glimmering Lane（dungeon）
5 The Land of Hot Sand（field）
6 Small Explorers（dungeon）
7 Castle of Time（dungeon）
8 Charge!(battle)
9 The Iron Gatekeeper(battle)
10 Storm-like(battle)
11 Arrival!(end of battle)
12 See you tomorrow.(event)
13 Stand up! (event)
14 This world to love(event)
15 Elegy(event)
16 The black cloak goes（field）
17 Run under the moon（field）
18 Icy eyes（dungeon）
19 Setting sun（field）
20 The Trapped（dungeon）
21 Beginning of the End（dungeon）
22 Guardian(battle)
23 Defeat your nemesis! (battle)
24 Advent(battle)
25 Weaving Hope(end of battle)
26 Rest in peace(event)
27 Recollection(event)
28 At the End of Time(event)

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
